Summarizing radf models

Source: R/summary.R
summary.radf.Rd

summary method for class "radf"

# S3 method for radf
summary(object, cv = NULL, ...)

Arguments

object

An object of class radf().
cv

An object of class "cv". The output of mc_cv(), wb_cv() or sb_cv()
...

further arguments passed to methods, not used.

Value

Returns a list of summary statistics, the t-statistic and the critical values of the ADF, SADF and GSADF.

Examples

# \donttest{
# Simulate bubble processes, compute the t-stat and critical values
rsim_data <- radf(sim_data)

# Summary, diagnostics and datestamp (default)
summary(rsim_data)
#> Using 'radf_crit' as 'cv'argument..
#> 
#> ── Summary (minw = 19, lag = 0) ─────────────────── Monte Carlo (nrep = 2000) ──
#> 
#>  psy1 
#>         tstat      90%       95%     99%
#> ADF    -2.461  -0.4127  -0.08117  0.6521
#> SADF    1.946   0.9879   1.29458  1.9157
#> GSADF   5.190   1.7099   1.97410  2.5708
#> 
#>  psy2 
#>         tstat      90%       95%     99%
#> ADF    -2.858  -0.4127  -0.08117  0.6521
#> SADF    7.880   0.9879   1.29458  1.9157
#> GSADF   7.880   1.7099   1.97410  2.5708
#> 
#>  evans 
#>         tstat      90%       95%     99%
#> ADF    -5.830  -0.4127  -0.08117  0.6521
#> SADF    5.283   0.9879   1.29458  1.9157
#> GSADF   5.985   1.7099   1.97410  2.5708
#> 
#>  div 
#>         tstat      90%       95%     99%
#> ADF    -1.950  -0.4127  -0.08117  0.6521
#> SADF    1.113   0.9879   1.29458  1.9157
#> GSADF   1.335   1.7099   1.97410  2.5708
#> 
#>  blan 
#>         tstat      90%       95%     99%
#> ADF    -5.146  -0.4127  -0.08117  0.6521
#> SADF    3.930   0.9879   1.29458  1.9157
#> GSADF  10.951   1.7099   1.97410  2.5708
#> 

diagnostics(rsim_data)
#> Using 'radf_crit' as 'cv'argument..
#> 
#> ── Diagnostics (option = gsadf) ───────────────────────────────── Monte Carlo ──
#> 
#> psy1:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> psy2:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> evans:    Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> div:      Cannot reject H0! 
#> blan:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> 

datestamp(rsim_data)
#> Using 'radf_crit' as 'cv'argument..
#> 
#> ── Datestamp (min_duration = 0) ───────────────────────────────── Monte Carlo ──
#> 
#> psy1 :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    44  55       12
#> 
#> psy2 :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    22  40       19
#> 2    62  70        9
#> 
#> evans :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    20  21        2
#> 2    44  45        2
#> 3    66  67        2
#> 
#> blan :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    34  36        3
#> 2    84  86        3
#> 

#' # Diagnostics for 'sadf'
diagnostics(rsim_data, option = "sadf")
#> Using 'radf_crit' as 'cv'argument..
#> 
#> ── Diagnostics (option = sadf) ────────────────────────────────── Monte Carlo ──
#> 
#> psy1:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> psy2:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> evans:    Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> div:      Rejects H0 for significance level of 10% 
#> blan:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> 

# Use log(T)/T rule of thumb to omit periods of explosiveness which are short-lived
rot <- psy_ds(sim_data)
datestamp(rsim_data, min_duration = rot)
#> Using 'radf_crit' as 'cv'argument..
#> 
#> ── Datestamp (min_duration = 5) ───────────────────────────────── Monte Carlo ──
#> 
#> psy1 :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    44  55       12
#> 
#> psy2 :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    22  40       19
#> 2    62  70        9
#> 

# Summary, diagnostics and datestamp (Wild Bootstrapped critical values)

wb <- wb_cv(sim_data)
#>  1/5 2/5 3/5 4/5 5/5

summary(rsim_data, cv = wb)
#> 
#> ── Summary (minw = 19, lag = 0) ──────────────── Wild Bootstrap (nboot = 500) ──
#> 
#>  psy1 
#>        t-stat      90%     95%      99%
#> ADF    -2.461  -0.5391  -0.369  0.02854
#> SADF    1.946   1.4169   1.971  2.69363
#> GSADF   5.190   2.7187   3.203  4.49386
#> 
#>  psy2 
#>        t-stat      90%      95%      99%
#> ADF    -2.858  -0.6383  -0.4793  -0.2611
#> SADF    7.880   2.9424   3.5892   5.3489
#> GSADF   7.880   3.8446   5.0388   7.2181
#> 
#>  evans 
#>        t-stat      90%     95%       99%
#> ADF    -5.830  -0.5895  -0.373  -0.07454
#> SADF    5.283   5.2183   7.081  13.18804
#> GSADF   5.985   8.3715   9.848  14.85232
#> 
#>  div 
#>        t-stat      90%     95%     99%
#> ADF    -1.950  -0.3637  0.1666  0.7718
#> SADF    1.113   0.9281  1.2198  1.9276
#> GSADF   1.335   1.7193  2.0346  2.4493
#> 
#>  blan 
#>        t-stat      90%       95%      99%
#> ADF    -5.146  -0.2207  -0.08826   0.4698
#> SADF    3.930   3.1165   3.89335   6.4947
#> GSADF  10.951   6.3960   7.67078  10.0894
#> 

diagnostics(rsim_data, cv = wb)
#> 
#> ── Diagnostics (option = gsadf) ────────────────────────────── Wild Bootstrap ──
#> 
#> psy1:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> psy2:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> evans:    Cannot reject H0! 
#> div:      Cannot reject H0! 
#> blan:     Rejects H0 for significance level of 1% 
#> 

datestamp(rsim_data, cv = wb)
#> 
#> ── Datestamp (min_duration = 0) ────────────────────────────── Wild Bootstrap ──
#> 
#> psy1 :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    44  55       12
#> 
#> psy2 :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    23  40       18
#> 2    62  70        9
#> 
#> blan :
#>   Start End Duration
#> 1    34  36        3
#> 2    84  86        3
#> 
# }
